Works great, but are all old characters supposed to be erased by update?

I was able to fix the missing save files.  The game saves are located in /documents/neocoregames/van helsing/savegame

This version update looks for saves in a folder there named '0' .  The old version put them in a folder named '4919'  copy and paste all files from 4919 to folder 0 - -or just rename 4919 to 0.  Thanks!

REMARK!!

After fully tested again & again for weeks.

This torrent isn't the full completed version include the update 1 to update 10(1.1.00), these torrent missing some of the effect & unknown.
eg, the BARRIER, enemy summon barrier contain sound only.
eg, the RAIN never appear.
eg, the rifle missing smoke effect.
etc.

These modded version is somehow for easy play & set armor obviously.
